room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Gold" by Escape Rooms Newport in Newport
room_description:
You have been shanghaied to the Caribbean by Captain Black Eyes, the meanest and nastiest pirate to sail the seven seas. You are aboard his ship and desperate to escape.
As the crew drinks their evening grog, you know they will be at least an hour and so you secretly enter the Captain's cabin. If you manage to find his stash of gold, you'll be able to bargain your way off the ship. You have 60 minutes find his hidden treasure and save your booty, lest you walk the plank into the shark-infested waters...
